tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:name: SASB Standards Taxonomy 2024
tp:taxonomyPackage.tp:description:
The SASB Standards Taxonomy 2024 reflects the presentation and disclosure requirements of the SASB Standards as issued by the International Sustainability Standards Board (ISSB) in December 2023.
Note: The SASB Standards Taxonomy 2024 was originally released on 28 October 2024. This package was then updated to remove standard labels from six typed dimensions (DiversityGroupDomain, EnforcementActionDomain, GICSClassification, HospitalDomain, PlanTypeDomain, TailingsStorageFacilityNameDomain). The updated package was released on 7 November 2024.

tp:license.name: The IFRS Taxonomy - Terms and Conditions

tp:entryPoint.tp:name: The complete SASB taxonomy including document & entity information and deprecated elements
tp:entryPoint.tp:description: This entry point includes ALL components for the SASB Taxonomy. Related taxonomies are also imported.
